text:
e="preserve">Yara Abou Monsef (Arabic: يارا أبو منصف; born 31 May 1996) [1] is a Lebanese model, actress, social media personality known as a content creator and women empowerment influencer.
Biography.
Yara Abou Monsef (Arabic: يارا أبو منصف; born 31 May 1996) [1] is a Lebanese model, actress, social media personality known as a content creator and women empowerment influencer. She started actively posting content on the social video sharing app, TikTok, in early 2019, where she quickly amassed a large following, Her TikTok account as of August 2020 has half million followers and counting.
Career.
Yara was born and raised in Ain Zebde.
She speaks three languages fluently: English, French, and Arabic.
She was elected as the second runner-up in Miss Lebanon 2018 as her quick wit and educated answers earned her the respect of the Lebanese as a woman of intellect.
Yara is a World Vision Organization volunteer, youth leader, and tourist guide in Ain Zebde with the Nature Conservation Center-American University of Beirut.
She is an excellent orator and she shares a passion for acting and singing. She started actively posting content on the social video sharing app, TikTok, in early 2020.
Personal Life.
She has completed a bachelor’s degree in biology and a Master’s degree in animal biology at the Lebanese University (2014-2018) and has graduated as a double diplomate in Bio-Health engineering and Molecular diagnostics at the Grenoble Alpes University and the Lebanese University (2018-2019).
Yara was born in Lebanon to a Lebanese father, Ahmad Abou Monsef, and a Lebanese mother, Micheline Kiwan. She has three siblings, two sisters and one brother. She moved to Beirut when she was 18 years old. Most of her family members are living abroad, She likes old music, the Rahbani brothers and fairouz mainly.
Management.
Echo, a sister company of Watary Digital.
